CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Royal Academy?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Royal Academy is arc {Alex Laboratory}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc NIT?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc NIT is arc {Alex Laboratory}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Royal Academy} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Alex Laboratory to Royal Academy in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Royal Academy to Alex Laboratory in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between NIT and Alex Laboratory in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between NIT and Alex Laboratory is {22}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Royal Academy and Alex Laboratory in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Royal Academy and Alex Laboratory is {23}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Alex Laboratory?
SC.A: The total flow output from Alex Laboratory is {52}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Alex Laboratory?
SC.A: The total flow input by Alex Laboratory is {45}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 47? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {52} from {Royal Academy} to {NIT}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 22? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {9} from {Alex Laboratory} to {NIT}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 22 and 32? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {22} from {NIT} to {Alex Laboratory}, a flow of {23} from {Royal Academy} to {Alex Laboratory}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Royal Academy to Alex Laboratory or from Alex Laboratory to Royal Academy?
NC.A: The flow from {Alex Laboratory} to {Royal Academy} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from NIT to Alex Laboratory, from NIT to Royal Academy, or from Royal Academy to NIT?
NC.A: The flow from {Royal Academy} to {NIT} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Alex Laboratory}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {NIT} and {Royal Academy}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc NIT, Arc Royal Academy, Arc Alex Laboratory}.
